summary: Minor first world problems abound here at Chez Alex this morning.  As the master drain that services both our laundry and kitchen sink has started backing up. summary: OverviewHashiCorp Boundary Enterprise and HCP Boundary support SSH session recording, with the resulting sessions stored in an S3 or MinIO storage backend owned by the customer.  This storage process leverages a plugin architecture using corresponding AWS and MinIO plugins.  Boundary 0...
title: Boundary’s SSH session recording using Google Cloud Storage

summary:
> LINK · 'Why the Guardian is no longer posting on X'

We wanted to let readers know that we will no longer post on any official Guardian editorial accounts on the social media site X (formerly Twitter).  We think that the benefits of being on X are now outweighed by the negatives and that resources could be better used promoting our journalism elsewhere. 

Emphasis mine, there...
title: > The Guardian is ceasing their Twitter posting
